        public Sphere()

      • Sphere

        public Sphere(double x,
              double y,
              double z,
              double radius,
              double strokeWeight,
              java.awt.Color strokeColor,
              java.awt.Color fillColor)
        Creates a sphere object
        Parameters:
        x - is the x coordinate of the sphere
        y - is the y coordinate of the sphere
        z - is the z coordinate of the sphere
        radius - is the radius of the sphere
        strokeWeight - is the thickness of the lines used to draw the sphere
        strokeColor - is the color of the lines used to draw the sphere
        fillColor - is the color that the sphere is filled with
